definition: to plan to/to draft (a plan)/to imitate/to assess/to compare/pseudo-
doubtful/suspicious/variant of 擬|拟[ni3]/to emulate/to imitate
"hand" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 64), occurring in 提, 把, 打 etc
to use/by means of/according to/in order to/because of/at (a certain date or place)
abbr. for Israel 以色列[Yi3 se4 lie4]
imitation/to simulate/to imitate/analog (device, as opposed to digital)
to compare/to draw a parallel/to match/analogy/metaphor/comparison
first draft/to draw up (a first version)
to fit (data to a model)/a (close) fit
to write in the style of some author/to write as if from the mouth of sb/a pastiche

sentences.english: The center conditions and isochronous center conditions for a class of quasi - analytic systems were investigated.
sentences.chinese: 研究了一类拟解析系统的中心条件与等时中心条件。

sentences.english: Connection among quasi-H closedness, weakly continuous mapping and compactness is also shown.
sentences.chinese: 并指出了拟H闭性与弱连续映射和紧性的联系。

sentences.english: The definition of the pre-R0 separation axiom was introduced.
sentences.chinese: 定义了不分明拓扑空间的拟R0分离公理。

sentences.english: We update sensitivities matrix by the quasi-Newton method after the first inversion.
sentences.chinese: 在第一次反演之后，采用拟牛顿法更新灵敏度矩阵。

sentences.english: In the architecture, the old building like Cosmological temple was built according to the idea of "Round Sky & Square Earth".
sentences.chinese: 在建制上，古代的建筑样式如明堂就拟天圆地方而建。

sentences.english: The author analyses the historical decline reasons of Qutan Temple from five aspects.
sentences.chinese: 笔者拟从五个方面分析瞿昙寺衰落的历史原因。

sentences.english: On the uniqueness of entire functions;
sentences.chinese: 研究了一类整函数的拟素性。

sentences.english: The notion of strong Q-semismoothness for a quasidifferentiable function was proposed.
sentences.chinese: 引入了拟可微函数的拟强半光滑性。

sentences.english: The notion of strong Q-semismoothness for a quasidifferentiable function was proposed.
sentences.chinese: 引入了拟可微函数的拟强半光滑性。

sentences.english: The central government will allocate 43.3 billion yuan to stimulate employment;
sentences.chinese: 中央财政拟投入433亿元用于促进就业。

sentences.english: One aspect of the invention is concerned with cannabimimetic pyrazole analogs.
sentences.chinese: 本发明一方面涉及拟大麻吡唑类似物。

sentences.english: Echeveria agavoides grows in a certain area of Mexico.
sentences.chinese: 景天科拟石莲花属植物冬云生长在墨西哥特定的区域。

sentences.english: In your case, we are prepared to be lenient .
sentences.chinese: 根据你的情况，我们拟予以从宽处理。

sentences.english: The stability of the solutions set for symmetric strong vector quasi-equilibrium problems are studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究对称强向量拟均衡问题解集的稳定性。

sentences.english: Finally, this paper gives applications of the above results to quasiregular mappings.
sentences.chinese: 最后，给出上述结论在拟正则映射中的应用。

sentences.english: This paper studies the initial boundary value problem for a class of quasilinear pesudoparabolic integrodifferential equations.
sentences.chinese: 研究一类拟线性拟抛物型积分微分方程的初边值问题。

definition: to fund/to put money into sth/to invest
to reply officially to a subordinate
